meanings.definition: Nitrofurans: a class of antibiotics used to treat urinary tract infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed nitrofurans to help clear up the urinary tract infection.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother takes nitrofurans whenever she has a urinary tract infection.
meanings.sent3: Why did the bacteria refuse to dance? Because they heard nitrofurans were coming to the party!
meanings.sent4: The nitrofurans acted like tiny soldiers, fighting off the invading bacteria in the urinary tract.
meanings.sent5: The bright orange color of the nitrofurans pills made them easy to spot in the medicine cabinet.
